A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'D give it 0 star rating if this allowed me. This movie made me not care about the continuation of the saga. i know they will pull SOMETHING out  of their asses to try to fix this debacle\, but i don't care about the rest of the story. the movie felt like an intellectual property rather than an actual star wars movie\, all that was shown during the trailer was just expectation fuel\,  cus THAT's all this movie had.
